dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Mikhail Lomtadze, the CEO of Kaspi.kz, was just talking about their fifth year in a row at the top of Kazakhstan's e-commerce rankings.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Mikhail Lomtadze, the C E O of the website, was just talking about their fifth year in a row at the top of Kazakhstan's e-commerce rankings.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: For the fourth year in a row Kaspi.kz has taken first place in the ranking of Kazakhstans largest e-commerce platforms: TOP KZ Retail E-Commerce 2021.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and they've got over 12 million users on that Super App now, which is just massive.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and they've got over twelve million users on that Super App now, which is just massive.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Already more than 10 million Kazakhstanis use Kaspi.kzs leading Super App.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's wild—they're planning to have 2 million products by next year, up from 1.2 million. That's some serious growth.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's wild-they're planning to have two million products by next year, up from one point two million. That's some serious growth.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We now offer more than 1 million products and our team is continually developing new innovative e-commerce services.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And you know, a lot of those sellers are small businesses, right? SMEs that are really thriving thanks to the platform.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And you know, a lot of those sellers are small businesses, right? SMEs that are really thriving thanks to the platform.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Most of our partners are small and medium-sized companies, who are seeing higher sales, developing their businesses and together with us, contributing the growth of Kazakhstans economy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. They mentioned sales increases, business development—it's like a whole ecosystem supporting the local entrepreneurs.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. They mentioned sales increases, business development-it's like a whole ecosystem supporting the local entrepreneurs.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Most of our partners are small and medium-sized companies, who are seeing higher sales, developing their businesses and together with us, contributing the growth of Kazakhstans economy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Plus, they added international money transfers recently. That's gotta be huge for people sending money abroad.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Plus, they added international money transfers recently. That's gotta be huge for people sending money abroad.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. And the numbers don't lie—$1.1 billion in GMV in 2020, which is seven times more than Wildberries.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. And the numbers don't lie-one point one dollars billion in G M V in twenty twenty, which is seven times more than Wildberries.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to published ranking, Kaspi.kzs 2020 e-commerce GMV of $915 million, was more than 6x higher than # 2 e-commerce player, Wildberries.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Wow, that's dominance. And the ranking itself is put together by Forbes Kazakhstan and Deloitte, so you know it's legit.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow, that's dominance. And the ranking itself is put together by Forbes Kazakhstan and Deloitte, so you know it's legit.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The TOP KZ Retail E-Commerce ranking is compiled annually by Forbes Kazakhstan in conjunction with consulting company Baker Tilly Kazakhstan and based upon online sales.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and the e-commerce market in Kazakhstan grew 125% in the first half of 2021. That's explosive.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and the e-commerce market in Kazakhstan grew one hundred twenty five percent in the first half of twenty twenty one. That's explosive.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to a study conducted by PwC and the Digital Kazakhstan Association, the e-commerce market in Kazakhstan grew by 116% in the first half of 2021 to 426 billion tenge.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Marketplaces like Kaspi are just becoming the go-to for shoppers—variety, convenience, all that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Marketplaces like Kaspi are just becoming the go-to for shoppers-variety, convenience, all that.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: At the same time, buyers are clearly opting for marketplaces, that enable them to purchase goods from a wide range of merchants.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And for businesses, it's not just about selling; they get tech, delivery, advertising—the whole package.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And for businesses, it's not just about selling; they get tech, delivery, advertising-the whole package.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Connecting to marketplaces gives small and medium-sized businesses access to the latest technology, new online sales channels, a large customer base, delivery and advertising services.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Orders more than tripled? That's insane momentum.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Orders more than tripled? That's insane momentum.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It really shows how integrated these platforms are becoming in daily life and the economy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It really shows how integrated these platforms are becoming in daily life and the economy.

dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. Hard to imagine shopping any other way there now.
